Bitterroot Retreat Dome

Are you looking for a unique tranquil get away emersed in Nature? Come and enjoy this phenomenal Eco Luxury dome! Boho themed dome sits directly next to the Lee Metcalf National Wildlife Refuge in the Bitterroot Valley of MT. The land is home to many bird species, elk, deer, and other wildlife. Guaranteed to be a experience you will never forget! The accommodations are comfortable and the view is stunning! Hiking and biking trails, hot air balloon rides, guided fishing tours and much more! The space This property is located at the Headquarters of Global Glamping, the distributor of these eco friendly easy on the Earth homes! After your stay here we guarantee you'll want one!

$100

For night
Size: 414 sq ft

Lewis & Clark Glamping Yurt

Looking for a different kind of experience? Ever stayed in a Yurt before? This Yurt is a one of a kind experience! This Yurt overlooks the Lee Metcalf Wildlife Refuge and take it from us and the reviews, the views you will enjoy are breath taking! This Yurt is cozy, comfortable, and stylish featuring a 30'x30' deck with a dining table for a view you and your family won't forget! The fire pit and restroom is in close proximity to the Yurt! The Lee Metcalf Wildlife Refuge offers stunning views! The space The yurt is on 30 acres in Stevensville, MT. Stevensville is the first town (first founded town) in Montana. It is off of Eastside Hwy in between Florence & Stevensville. The yurt is a canvas yurt and it does have two windows and insulation. There is a fire pit outside of the yurt as well for you to enjoy. There is a wood burning stove inside the yurt. The top of the yurt can open up so you have a beautiful view of the stars. The sky is brilliant and crystal clear. There are board games, as well as Bad Mitten. The Bitterroot River is in close proximity to the property. Guests have river access in either (Stevensville) Stevi or Florence. Pretty much smack dab in the middle of both towns. There is a Kurig Machine for coffee, microwave, Mini-Fridge, paper plates, plastic utensils, can opener & wine opener. Fire wood is available for guests for FREE upon request. There is a BBQ grill with tongs & charcoal. There is a twin size air mattress and two cots. Guest access There is access to the entire property. There are amazing views on the backside of the property overlooking the Lee Metcalf Wildlife Refuge. Other things to note There are other guests on the premises. It is 30 acres and everyone has plenty of privacy. There is a host that is on property if any guests need anything Ricky is happy to help. I also own ELUV8 which is a skateboarding company and we have some of the best skateboarders in the world on our team. Bradley Pichler AKA Bread on IG: @BreadBlunts just won the Converse best trick. There are sometimes skateboarders at the property skating in the private ELUV8 warehouse IG: @ELUV8skateboards . They are good kids and won't bother my guests. You can follow Global Glamping and please feel free to tag us in your photos and stories @Glamping.Global please follow and like us on FB & IG! Enjoy your stay!

$100

For night
Size: 415 sq ft

Lone Pine Dome

Looking for a truly unique experience emersed in Nature? This dome is nestled in a vast open space with a perfect view of the Montana Mountains in the distance. This dome is quaint, cozy and stylish providing a truly one of a kind experience! The stars above will wow you. The natural setting is soothing. The accommodations are cozy. The views are unforgettable. We guarantee there will be no other experience like it! Located overlooking the Lee Metcalf National Wildlife Refuge! Join Us!

$100

For night
Beds: 1 Double(s), 1 Queen(s)

The Trailhead Yurt

Looking for a different kind of experience? Ever stayed in a Yurt before? The Trailhead Yurt is a stylish one of a kind experience! The views you will enjoy are Breath Taking! This Yurt is cozy, comfortable, and clean featuring everything you need to truly relax in Nature. The fire pit and restroom is in close proximity to the Yurt! The Trailhead Yurt has stunning views and the animals are abundant! You can expect to see nature alive while staying here! We look forward to having you

$100

For night
Beds: 2 Single(s), 1 Queen(s)
